content_matching_logins_title.description: Title for the section displaying login items that match the current context

content_save_prompt_add_header.message: Czy chcesz dodać ten element do 2FAS Pass?
content_save_prompt_add_header.description: Header asking if the user wants to save a new login item

content_save_prompt_update_header.description: Header asking if the user wants to update an existing login item

content_save_prompt_don_t_ask.description: Option to prevent the save prompt from appearing in the future

content_save_prompt_add_login.description: Button label to add a new login item to 2FAS Pass

content_save_prompt_update_login.description: Button label to update an existing login item in 2FAS Pass

autofill_cross_domain_warning.message: Ten formularz znajduje się w innej domenie (CURRENT_DOMAIN) niż strona główna (TOP_DOMAIN). Czy chcesz kontynuować wypełnianie?
autofill_cross_domain_warning.description: Warning shown when autofill is attempted on a cross-domain iframe

autofill_cross_domain_warning_no_access.message: Ten formularz znajduje się w domenie CURRENT_DOMAIN i jest osadzony w ramce iframe z innej domeny. Czy na pewno chcesz kontynuować wypełnianie?
autofill_cross_domain_warning_no_access.description: Warning shown when autofill is attempted on a cross-domain iframe and we cannot access the parent domain

content_cross_domain_dialog_title.description: Title for the cross-domain confirmation dialog

content_cross_domain_dialog_message.message: Ta strona zawiera formularze z zewnętrznych domen. Czy chcesz wypełnić dane w tych ramkach?
content_cross_domain_dialog_message.description: Message explaining that the page has cross-domain iframes with forms

content_cross_domain_dialog_cancel.description: Button to cancel autofill and close the dialog

content_cross_domain_dialog_autofill.description: Button to confirm and proceed with autofill

content_cross_domain_dialog_trust_domain.description: Button to trust a single domain and proceed with autofill

content_cross_domain_dialog_trust_domain.message: Lub wybierz domeny, którym chcesz zaufać:
content_cross_domain_dialog_trust_domain.description: Header text above the multi-domain trust checkbox list

content_cross_domain_dialog_trust_select.description: Button to trust selected domains and proceed with autofill
